title: Drawing, "Project for an embroidered vertical border", ca. 1808
medium: Incised lines, gouache colors, glazed heavy paper
inscribed: Written with ink at right: agoirand
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A flower spray and a plant are to alternate growing from two stripes. Written with ink at right: agoirand.
